title: Teambuilder Q.Q time.
body: Haven't used teambuilder for a long while now, decided to start using it again. Currently at 30min's into teambuilder and chill, and the LoL client still hasn't given me the look yet. Help, comments or laughing at me is welcome and encouraged.

replies.body: I just made a video, that I'll post later, where I try to queue up for team builder for 3 hours and don't get in game.

Yeh, TB has colossal queue times. You want to know why it has colossal queue times? Because no one uses it... And you want to know why no one uses it? Because it has colossal queue times... If people just stopped complaining about the queue times and actually used it there wouldn't be a problem...

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5TrhPuyh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-29T02:14:19.629+0000)
>
> Yeh, TB has colossal queue times. You want to know why it has colossal queue times? Because no one uses it... And you want to know why no one uses it? Because it has colossal queue times... If people just stopped complaining about the queue times and actually used it there wouldn't be a problem...

Yeah but people who complain about the problem have been sitting there waiting for a game, actually using TB but the problem is still there.
It's a colossal waste of time and a monumental flop if I've ever seen one. I'd much rather wait 30 mins for Normal Draft rather than the cancer that is Team Builder.
